modal.signupTitleHelper: Create an account to rate your parole officer.
modal.forgotPasswordTitleHelper: Enter the email address you used to register, and we'll email you a password reset link.
modal.confirmSignupTitle: Check your email to finish signing up
modal.loginConfirmSignupDetail1: We sent an email to <bold>{{email}}</bold> to confirm this email belongs to you.
modal.loginConfirmSignupDetail2: Tap on the button in the email to finish signing up.
